scenario_text.value:
All right, everyone line up! Be good, or
you don’t get a treat!
Okaaay!

You’re surprisingly good with those kids,
Miu.
Takuma?! Where’d you come from?!

Heheh, I feel kind of embarrassed now. I
didn’t think anyone was watching.

Embarrassed? That isn’t anything to get
embarrassed over.

Taking care of these kiddies so well is
admirable, if anything!

You think? I just find it is good
to have something to do.

I like playing with these kids, maybe because
it lets me forget about everything else.

Heheh, don’t be so shy!
You’re surprisingly like a big sister, Miu!

(Miu, a big sister? I’ve never thought of her
like that.)

(She did get them all together at the castle.
Maybe she’s got a serious side?)

(When I think of Miu not as Kaito’s little
sister, but as her own person...)
(In front of these kids, Miu gives the impression of a...)
Big sister type?
Complete softie.
Total little sister.

Hmm, a big sister...? I guess?
Hard for me to say.

Still, I can tell you’re filling those boots
as best as you can, despite your size.

Heheh, that’s an exaggeration!
I’m not so sure about that myself.

I think it suits me better to be a queen
than a big sister.

(It suits her to be a queen?
That’s an impressive thing to say...)
Maybe ’cause you’re a total softie.
A total WHAT?!

Huh? Well I mean, you’re usually so kind to
the people in your life.

Looking after people, helping where you can.
That’s a softie if I’ve ever seen one.

You might be right, but there must be a less
awkward way to describe it!

But hey, that’s how an older sister would act
in the first place, right, Takuma?

You know what? You’re right, Shakomon. You
make a good big sister, Miu.

Really? You think I’m doing a good job?
Heheh, I’m glad to hear it.

Hmm, all I see is a little sister type when
I look at you.

Hardly a surprise, really. You are older than
her after all, Takuma.

Still, you could see her personality
differently if you cast away this bias.
Maybe that’s what it is.

Leave the little ones to me. I’ll take real
good care of them, you’ll see!
